explains: adv. 自动地；以自由意志

sentences.en: I would never leave here voluntarily.
sentences.cn: 我永远不会自愿地离开这里。

sentences.en: He was not asked to leave—he went voluntarily.
sentences.cn: 没人让他走，是他主动走的。

sentences.en: Four people who sought refuge in the Italian embassy have left voluntarily.
sentences.cn: 到意大利大使馆寻求避难的四个人已经自愿离开了。
